Title: Authorizes municipalities to establish an emergency repair pilot program
Summary: Authorizes municipalities to establish an emergency repair pilot program; enables municipalities to repair immediately hazardous code violations in buildings where the owner has not undertaken such repairs in a reasonable time.
LawCode: Add ยง99-aa, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing certain municipalities to establish an emergency repair pilot program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
